titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Fanny Burney Papers, 1782-1840
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Laura Streett

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Laura Streett, 2009

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: One letter from Burney to Mrs. Walshingham (1786), 2 letters from Hannah More to Burney (1782, 1786), 6 letters to Burney from other women, and one letter from Burney’s niece to a family friend announcing the death of Burney (1840).

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Fanny Burney (Frances Burney D'Arblay) was an English novelist, playwright, diarist and letter writer. She is known for her novels, Evelina, Cecilia, Camilla and The Wanderer, as well as several published volumes of her journals and correspondence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: One letter from Burney to Mrs. Walshingham (1786), 2 letters from Hannah More to Burney (1782, 1786), 6 letters to Burney from other women, and one letter from Burney’s niece to a family friend announcing the death of Burney (1840).

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Part of a collection gathered by Paula Peyraud. The letter from Burney's niece to Mrs. Pierce was purchased at a Christie's sale in April 1981.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Purchased for Vassar College by Bart Auerbach from the auction of the Paula Peyraud Collection, 6 May 2009 (M2009-009).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Fanny Burney Papers, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.

appraisal.head: Appraisal
appraisal.p: Appraised for auction by Bloomsbury Auctions, 2009.

otherfindaid.head: Other Finding Aids
otherfindaid.p: Items in this collection are described in Bloomsbury Auctions' catalog of the Paula Peyraud Collection (lot nos. 197, 209, and 224).
